cards.rules_text:
Creatures you control have “{T}: Add one mana of any color.”
Whenever you cast a creature spell, it enters with an additional flying counter on it if a source that produced mana spent to cast it had flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.

{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a Hero spell or legendary spell.
{2}, {T}: Chronicle. Activate only as a sorcery and only if a Hero you control attacked this turn. [i](To chronicle, create a tapped 1/1 Hero creature token or put a +1/+1 counter on a Hero you control.)[/i]

[+1]: You may put an artifact or creature card with mana value 3 or less from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield with a steel counter on it. It becomes a 4/4 artifact creature in addition to its other types.
[-2]: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a tapped token that's a copy of it, except it has no abilities.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “Artifacts you control have indestructible” and “Creatures you control get +2/+2.”

cards.rules_text:
When you cast this spell, for each color other than white, search your library and/or graveyard for a legendary permanent card that's exactly that color, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle.
[+1]: Whenever an ability of another legendary permanent you control triggers or is activated this turn, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.
[-2]: You may put a legendary permanent card with mana value 6 or less from your hand onto the battlefield.
